price: Oni su, Gospodaru moj, mnoge ljude na stranputicu naveli. Onaj ko bude mene slijedio - moje je vjere, a onaj ko bude protiv mene ustajao, pa - Ti si, uistinu, Onaj Koji oprašta grijehe i milostiv si.
arabic: رَبِّ إِنَّهُنَّ أَضۡلَلۡنَ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِۖ فَمَن تَبِعَنِي فَإِنَّهُۥ مِنِّيۖ وَمَنۡ عَصَانِي فَإِنَّكَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbi innahunna aḍlalna kathīran mina al-nāsi faman tabiʿanī fa-innahu minnī waman ʿaṣānī fa-innaka ghafūrun raḥīmun
